sources.title: The Tree That Saved Christmas | Full Movie | Lacey Chabert
sources.description:
Twenty years after saving a frail sapling from a cutting crew, Molly Logan (Lacey Chabert) learns that the bank is foreclosing on her parents' Christmas tree farm. Can the tree she spared rescue the holiday?
2014.  Stars: Lacey Chabert, Corey Sevier, Matthew Kevin Anderson

metadata.Plot: A woman returns to her Vermont hometown to try and save her family's Christmas tree farm from foreclosure.
metadata.Actors: Lacey Chabert, Corey Sevier, Matthew Kevin Anderson
